data.text: @MrGalGeog @sqanews Given the sheer amount of content within Geography this is totally unfair on our candidates.

@MrScottGeog @sqanews There are also some inaccuracies. E.g."with 1 minute per mark a 10 mark question should take about 10 minutes". In fact each mark has 1 minute 6 seconds so that's 11 minutes and this adds up over the exam. A similar in N5 document.
@MrGalGeog @MrScottGeog @sqanews There is nothing for higher geography right ?

@MrScottGeog @sqanews It tells them what topics not to revise and tells them the topics of the 2 x 8 mark questions ( which I’d say are the toughest). Meanwhile, I’d suggest the Geog one is inaccurate- what about the map evidence mark candidates get? https://t.co/93teNaFJNs
@MrGalGeog @sqanews I've not actually seen the MS one, they aren't exactly easy to find either!
@MrScottGeog @sqanews Appalling. Especially when you compare to what Modern Studies have been given. When I read the Geography document, I honestly thought I’d clicked the wrong link.

@MrScottGeog @sqanews Wow, some enlightening stuff here! 

On a related note I invigilated a mock exam poster and the official JCQ poster said the kids couldn’t have MP3 players in the room - nice and current 🙄
